name: Quartet
genres: Action > Side view > 2D scrolling > Arcade > Platform > Shooter > Direct control
desc: Ported from the Arcade original, Quartet features a duo (instead of a quartet) Mary and Edger jetpacking their way through six enemy-riddled rounds in search of the casket of Queen Cynthia. Vitality takes the form of a countdown, forcing the player to traverse quickly through the rounds. Defeating a boss grants a key to the next round. Based on the player's performance in a round bonus points and medals for a higher rank are awarded.
